com.arjuna.ats.internal.jts

Class ControlWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.arjuna.ats.internal.jts.ControlWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reapable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ServerControlWrapper

    public class ControlWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements Reapable
    This class attempts to mask the local/remote control issue. We try to use local controls directly as much as possible and not register them with the ORB until the last minute. This improves performance *significantly*. At present we only do this for top-level transactions, but extending for nested transactions is straightforward. It also acts as a convenience class for ease of use. Therefore, some Coordinator and Terminator methods may be found directly on this class. Because of the way in which the implementation works, however, some of their signatures may be slightly different.
    Since:
    JTS 2.0.
    Version:
    $Id: ControlWrapper.java 2342 2006-03-30 13:06:17Z $
    Author:
    Mark Little (mark_little@hp.com)
